com.map
Class MapUsersOverlay

java.lang.Object
  Overlay
      com.map.MapUsersOverlay

public class MapUsersOverlay
extends Overlay

This class is used to paint users on top of the map

Author:
Juan Javier Garc√≠a, Aitor Martin, Andreas Kapouranis

onTap

public boolean onTap(GeoPoint p,

getClickLocation

private KUserInfo getClickLocation(MapView mapView,
                                   GeoPoint clickPoint)
This method calculates the area occupied by the users icons on the screen and compares them with the location of the click. If they match, we found a selected user.

Parameters:
mapView - the map
clickPoint - the point in the screen where the user click.
Returns:
KUserInfo the friend that the user select or null if the user does not select anyone.

drawMapLocations

private void drawMapLocations(Canvas canvas,
                              MapView mapView,
                              List<KUserInfo> listFriends,
                              KUserInfo mainUser)
This method translates the positions of all friends and the user to screen coordinates and paints them on the map.

Parameters:
canvas - where paint
mapView - map view
listFriends - list of friends to paint
mainUser - the user

drawNickWindow

private void drawNickWindow(KUserInfo us,
                            Canvas canvas,
                            MapView mapView)
This method paint the nick of the users on the map, for this aim, the system paints a grey rectangle on the map up the user icon and write the text into it.

Parameters:
us - the user
canvas - where paint
mapView - the map view

getInnerNickPaint

public Paint getInnerNickPaint()

the paint
